items.sentence: Tom and Mary shared an umbrella. However, it wasn\'t big enough and they both got wet.
The discovery of a new food does more for the human race than the discovery of a star.
Tom and Mary were too busy yelling at each other to notice that I\'d entered the room.
By the time Tom got to the bus stop, the bus he was planning to take had already left.
I\'m reading things like famous novels which have been rewritten in simplified French.
